card.name: Ancestral Recall
card.text: Target player draws three cards.

card.name: Animate Artifact
card.text: Enchant artifact As long as enchanted artifact isn't a creature, it's an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Animate Dead
card.text: Enchant creature card in a graveyard When Animate Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Animate Dead." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield under your control and attach Animate Dead to it. When Animate Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it. Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.

card.name: Animate Wall
card.text: Enchant Wall Enchanted Wall can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Ankh of Mishra
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, Ankh of Mishra deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

card.name: Armageddon
card.text: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Aspect of Wolf
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +X/+Y, where X is half the number of Forests you control, rounded down, and Y is half the number of Forests you control, rounded up.

card.name: Bad Moon
card.text: Black creatures get +1/+1.

card.name: Balance
card.text: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

card.name: Basalt Monolith
card.text: Basalt Monolith doesn't untap during your untap step. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool. {3}: Untap Basalt Monolith.

card.name: Berserk
card.text: Cast Berserk only before the combat damage step. Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.

card.name: Birds of Paradise
card.text: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Black Knight
card.text: First strike Protection from white

card.name: Black Lotus
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Black Lotus: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool.

card.name: Black Vise
card.text: As Black Vise enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, Black Vise deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand minus 4.

card.name: Black Ward
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from black. This effect doesn't remove Black Ward.

card.name: Blaze of Glory
card.text: Cast Blaze of Glory only during combat before blockers are declared. Target creature defending player controls can block any number of creatures this turn. It blocks each attacking creature this turn if able.

card.name: Blessing
card.text: Enchant creature {W}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Blue Elemental Blast
card.text: Choose one - Counter target red spell; or destroy target red permanent.

card.name: Blue Ward
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from blue. This effect doesn't remove Blue Ward.

card.name: Braingeyser
card.text: Target player draws X cards.

card.name: Burrowing
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has mountainwalk.

card.name: Camouflage
card.text: Cast Camouflage only during your declare attackers step. This turn, instead of declaring blockers, each defending player chooses any number of creatures he or she controls and divides them into a number of piles equal to the number of attacking creatures for whom that player is the defending player. Creatures he or she controls that can block additional creatures may likewise be put into additional piles. Assign each pile to a different one of those attacking creatures at random. Each creature in a pile that can block the creature that pile is assigned to does so.

card.name: Castle
card.text: Untapped creatures you control get +0/+2.

card.name: Celestial Prism
card.text: {2}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Channel
card.text: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Chaos Orb
card.text: {1}, {T}: If Chaos Orb is on the battlefield, flip Chaos Orb onto the battlefield from a height of at least one foot. If Chaos Orb turns over completely at least once during the flip, destroy all nontoken permanents it touches. Then destroy Chaos Orb.

card.name: Chaoslace
card.text: Target spell or permanent becomes red.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Black
card.text: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Blue
card.text: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Green
card.text: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Red
card.text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: White
card.text: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Clockwork Beast
card.text: Clockwork Beast enters the battlefield with seven +1/+0 counters on it. At end of combat, if Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast to be greater than seven. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Clone
card.text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Cockatrice
card.text: Flying Whenever Cockatrice blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Consecrate Land
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has indestructible and can't be enchanted by other Auras.

card.name: Conservator
card.text: {3}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

card.name: Contract from Below
card.text: Remove Contract from Below from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. Discard your hand, add the top card of your library to the ante, then draw seven cards.

card.name: Control Magic
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

card.name: Conversion
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Conversion unless you pay {W}{W}. All Mountains are Plains.

card.name: Copper Tablet
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Copper Tablet deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Copy Artifact
card.text: You may have Copy Artifact enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield, except it's an enchantment in addition to its other types.

card.name: Counterspell
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Creature Bond
card.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, Creature Bond deals damage equal to that creature's toughness to the creature's controller.

card.name: Crusade
card.text: White creatures get +1/+1.

card.name: Crystal Rod
card.text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Cursed Land
card.text: Enchant land At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted land's controller, Cursed Land deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Cyclopean Tomb
card.text: {2}, {T}: Put a mire counter on target non-Swamp land. That land is a Swamp for as long as it has a mire counter on it. Activate this ability only during your upkeep. When Cyclopean Tomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, at the beginning of each of your upkeeps for the rest of the game, remove all mire counters from a land that a mire counter was put onto with Cyclopean Tomb but that a mire counter has not been removed from with Cyclopean Tomb.

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Darkpact
card.text: Remove Darkpact from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. You own target card in the ante. Exchange that card with the top card of your library.

card.name: Death Ward
card.text: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Deathgrip
card.text: {B}{B}: Counter target green spell.

card.name: Deathlace
card.text: Target spell or permanent becomes black.

card.name: Demonic Attorney
card.text: Remove Demonic Attorney from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. Each player antes the top card of his or her library.

card.name: Demonic Hordes
card.text: {T}: Destroy target land. At the beginning of your upkeep, unless you pay {B}{B}{B}, tap Demonic Hordes and sacrifice a land of an opponent's choice.

card.name: Demonic Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Dingus Egg
card.text: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

card.name: Disenchant
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Disintegrate
card.text: Disintegrate deals X damage to target creature or player. That creature can't be regenerated this turn. If the creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Disrupting Scepter
card.text: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.

card.name: Dragon Whelp
card.text: Flying {R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Drain Life
card.text: Spend only black mana on X. Drain Life deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before Drain Life dealt damage or the creature's toughness.

card.name: Drain Power
card.text: Target player activates a mana ability of each land he or she controls. Then put all mana from that player's mana pool into yours.

card.name: Drudge Skeletons
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons.

card.name: Dwarven Demolition Team
card.text: {T}: Destroy target Wall.

card.name: Dwarven Warriors
card.text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Earthbind
card.text: Enchant creature When Earthbind enters the battlefield, if enchanted creature has flying, Earthbind deals 2 damage to that creature and Earthbind gains "Enchanted creature loses flying."

card.name: Earthquake
card.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

card.name: Elvish Archers
card.text: First strike

card.name: Evil Presence
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land is a Swamp.

card.name: False Orders
card.text: Cast False Orders only during the declare blockers step. Remove target creature defending player controls from combat. Creatures it was blocking that had become blocked by only that creature this combat become unblocked. You may have it block an attacking creature of your choice.

card.name: Farmstead
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {W}{W}. If you do, you gain 1 life."

card.name: Fastbond
card.text: You may play any number of additional lands on each of your turns. Whenever you play a land, if it wasn't the first land you played this turn, Fastbond deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Fear
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has fear.

card.name: Feedback
card.text: Enchant enchantment At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, Feedback deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Fireball
card.text: Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players. Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

card.name: Firebreathing
card.text: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Flashfires
card.text: Destroy all Plains.

card.name: Flight
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying.

card.name: Fog
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Force of Nature
card.text: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.

card.name: Forcefield
card.text: {1}: The next time an unblocked creature of your choice would deal combat damage to you this turn, prevent all but 1 of that damage.

card.name: Fork
card.text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell, except that the copy is red. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Frozen Shade
card.text: {B}: Frozen Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Fungusaur
card.text: Whenever Fungusaur is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Gaea's Liege
card.text: As long as Gaea's Liege isn't attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. As long as Gaea's Liege is attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests defending player controls. {T}: Target land becomes a Forest until Gaea's Liege leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Gauntlet of Might
card.text: Red creatures get +1/+1. Whenever a Mountain is tapped for mana, its controller adds {R} to his or her mana pool.

card.name: Giant Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Glasses of Urza
card.text: {T}: Look at target player's hand.

card.name: Gloom
card.text: White spells cost {3} more to cast. Activated abilities of white enchantments cost {3} more to activate.

card.name: Goblin Balloon Brigade
card.text: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Goblin King
card.text: Other Goblin creatures get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk.

card.name: Granite Gargoyle
card.text: Flying {R}: Granite Gargoyle gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Green Ward
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from green. This effect doesn't remove Green Ward.

card.name: Guardian Angel
card.text: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Until end of turn, you may pay {1} any time you could cast an instant. If you do, prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to that creature or player this turn.

card.name: Healing Salve
card.text: Choose one - Target player gains 3 life; or prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Helm of Chatzuk
card.text: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains banding until end of turn.

card.name: Holy Armor
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2. {W}: Enchanted creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Holy Strength
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

card.name: Howl from Beyond
card.text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Howling Mine
card.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

card.name: Hurricane
card.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

card.name: Hypnotic Specter
card.text: Flying Whenever Hypnotic Specter deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random.

card.name: Ice Storm
card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Icy Manipulator
card.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Illusionary Mask
card.text: {X}: You may choose a creature card in your hand whose mana cost could be paid by some amount of, or all of, the mana you spent on {X}. If you do, you may cast that card face down as a 2/2 creature spell without paying its mana cost. If the creature that spell becomes as it resolves has not been turned face up and would assign or deal damage, be dealt damage, or become tapped, instead it's turned face up and assigns or deals damage, is dealt damage, or becomes tapped. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Instill Energy
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can attack as though it had haste. {0}: Untap enchanted creature. Activate this ability only during your turn and only once each turn.

card.name: Invisibility
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by Walls.

card.name: Iron Star
card.text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Ironclaw Orcs
card.text: Ironclaw Orcs can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.

card.name: Island Sanctuary
card.text: If you would draw a card during your draw step, instead you may skip that draw. If you do, until your next turn, you can't be attacked except by creatures with flying and/or islandwalk.

card.name: Ivory Cup
card.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Jade Monolith
card.text: {1}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that source deals that damage to you instead.

card.name: Jade Statue
card.text: {2}: Jade Statue becomes a 3/6 Golem artifact creature until end of combat. Activate this ability only during combat.

card.name: Jayemdae Tome
card.text: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Juggernaut
card.text: Juggernaut attacks each turn if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

card.name: Jump
card.text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Karma
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Karma deals damage to that player equal to the number of Swamps he or she controls.

card.name: Keldon Warlord
card.text: Keldon Warlord's power and toughness are each equal to the number of non-Wall creatures you control.

card.name: Kormus Bell
card.text: All Swamps are 1/1 black creatures that are still lands.

card.name: Kudzu
card.text: Enchant land When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it. That land's controller attaches Kudzu to a land of his or her choice.

card.name: Lance
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has first strike.

card.name: Ley Druid
card.text: {T}: Untap target land.

card.name: Library of Leng
card.text: You have no maximum hand size. If an effect causes you to discard a card, discard it, but you may put it on top of your library instead of into your graveyard.

card.name: Lich
card.text: As Lich enters the battlefield, you lose life equal to your life total. You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. If you would gain life, draw that many cards instead. Whenever you're dealt damage, sacrifice that many nontoken permanents. If you can't, you lose the game. When Lich is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose the game.

card.name: Lifeforce
card.text: {G}{G}: Counter target black spell.

card.name: Lifelace
card.text: Target spell or permanent becomes green.

card.name: Lifetap
card.text: Whenever a Forest an opponent controls becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Living Artifact
card.text: Enchant artifact Whenever you're dealt damage, put that many vitality counters on Living Artifact. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a vitality counter from Living Artifact. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Living Lands
card.text: All Forests are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.

card.name: Living Wall
card.text: Defender {1}: Regenerate Living Wall.

card.name: Llanowar Elves
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Lord of Atlantis
card.text: Other Merfolk creatures get +1/+1 and have islandwalk.

card.name: Lord of the Pit
card.text: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Lord of the Pit. If you can't, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you.

card.name: Lure
card.text: Enchant creature All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

card.name: Magical Hack
card.text: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another.

card.name: Mana Flare
card.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.

card.name: Mana Short
card.text: Tap all lands target player controls and empty his or her mana pool.

card.name: Mana Vault
card.text: Mana Vault doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Mana Vault. At the beginning of your draw step, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Manabarbs
card.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Meekstone
card.text: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Natural Selection
card.text: Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle his or her library.

card.name: Nether Shadow
card.text: Haste At the beginning of your upkeep, if Nether Shadow is in your graveyard with three or more creature cards above it, you may put Nether Shadow onto the battlefield.

card.name: Nettling Imp
card.text: {T}: Choose target non-Wall creature the active player has controlled continuously since the beginning of the turn. That creature attacks this turn if able. If it doesn't, destroy it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only during an opponent's turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Nevinyrral's Disk
card.text: Nevinyrral's Disk enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

card.name: Nightmare

card.name: Northern Paladin
card.text: {W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target black permanent.

card.name: Orcish Artillery
card.text: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.

card.name: Orcish Oriflamme
card.text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Paralyze
card.text: Enchant creature When Paralyze enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {4}. If he or she does, untap the creature.

card.name: Personal Incarnation
card.text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Personal Incarnation this turn is dealt to its owner instead. Any player may activate this ability, but only if he or she owns Personal Incarnation. When Personal Incarnation dies, its owner loses half his or her life, rounded up.

card.name: Pestilence
card.text: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence. {B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Phantasmal Forces
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Phantasmal Forces unless you pay {U}.

card.name: Phantasmal Terrain

card.name: Pirate Ship
card.text: Pirate Ship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. {T}: Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to target creature or player. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Pirate Ship.

card.name: Plague Rats
card.text: Plague Rats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures named Plague Rats on the battlefield.

card.name: Power Leak
card.text: Enchant enchantment At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, that player may pay any amount of mana. Power Leak deals 2 damage to that player. Prevent X of that damage, where X is the amount of mana that player paid this way.

card.name: Power Sink
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If he or she doesn't, that player taps all lands with mana abilities he or she controls and empties his or her mana pool.

card.name: Power Surge
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Power Surge deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of untapped lands he or she controlled at the beginning of this turn.

card.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
card.text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Psionic Blast
card.text: Psionic Blast deals 4 damage to target creature or player and 2 damage to you.

card.name: Psychic Venom
card.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, Psychic Venom deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

card.name: Purelace
card.text: Target spell or permanent becomes white.

card.name: Raging River
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, each defending player divides all creatures without flying he or she controls into a "left" pile and a "right" pile. Then, for each attacking creature you control, choose "left" or "right." That creature can't be blocked this combat except by creatures with flying and creatures in a pile with the chosen label.

card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Red Elemental Blast
card.text: Choose one - Counter target blue spell; or destroy target blue permanent.

card.name: Resurrection

card.name: Reverse Damage
card.text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

card.name: Righteousness
card.text: Target blocking creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

card.name: Rock Hydra
card.text: Rock Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. For each 1 damage that would be dealt to Rock Hydra, if it has a +1/+1 counter on it, remove a +1/+1 counter from it and prevent that 1 damage. {R}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Rock Hydra this turn. {R}{R}{R}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Rock Hydra. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.text: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Scavenging Ghoul

card.name: Sea Serpent
card.text: Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Sea Serpent.

card.name: Sedge Troll

card.text: Destroy target artifact.

card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Siren's Call
card.text: Cast Siren's Call only during an opponent's turn, before attackers are declared. Creatures the active player controls attack this turn if able. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy all non-Wall creatures that player controls that didn't attack this turn. Ignore this effect for each creature the player didn't control continuously since the beginning of the turn.

card.name: Sleight of Mind
card.text: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another.

card.name: Smoke
card.text: Players can't untap more than one creature during their untap steps.

card.name: Sol Ring
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Soul Net
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Spell Blast
card.text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost X.

card.name: Stasis
card.text: Players skip their untap steps. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Stasis unless you pay {U}.

card.name: Steal Artifact
card.text: Enchant artifact You control enchanted artifact.

card.name: Stone Giant
card.text: {T}: Target creature you control with toughness less than Stone Giant's power gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Stone Rain
card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Stream of Life
card.text: Target player gains X life.

card.name: Sunglasses of Urza
card.text: You may spend white mana as though it were red mana.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Terror
card.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: The Hive
card.text: {5}, {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp onto the battlefield.

card.name: Thicket Basilisk
card.text: Whenever Thicket Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Thoughtlace
card.text: Target spell or permanent becomes blue.

card.name: Throne of Bone
card.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Time Vault
card.text: Time Vault enters the battlefield tapped. Time Vault doesn't untap during your untap step. If you would begin your turn while Time Vault is tapped, you may skip that turn instead. If you do, untap Time Vault. {T}: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Time Walk
card.text: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Timetwister
card.text: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library, then draws seven cards.

card.name: Tranquility
card.text: Destroy all enchantments.

card.name: Tsunami
card.text: Destroy all Islands.

card.name: Tunnel
card.text: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Twiddle
card.text: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Two-Headed Giant of Foriys
card.text: Trample Two-Headed Giant of Foriys can block an additional creature.

card.name: Unholy Strength
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

card.name: Unsummon
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Uthden Troll
card.text: {R}: Regenerate Uthden Troll.

card.name: Verduran Enchantress
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

card.name: Vesuvan Doppelganger
card.text: You may have Vesuvan Doppelganger enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield except it doesn't copy that creature's color and it gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have this creature become a copy of target creature except it doesn't copy that creature's color. If you do, this creature gains this ability."

card.name: Veteran Bodyguard
card.text: As long as Veteran Bodyguard is untapped, all damage that would be dealt to you by unblocked creatures is dealt to Veteran Bodyguard instead.

card.name: Volcanic Eruption
card.text: Destroy X target Mountains. Volcanic Eruption deals damage to each creature and each player equal to the number of Mountains put into a graveyard this way.

card.name: Wall of Air
card.text: Defender, flying

card.name: Wall of Bone
card.text: Defender {B}: Regenerate Wall of Bone.

card.name: Wall of Brambles
card.text: Defender {G}: Regenerate Wall of Brambles.

card.name: Wall of Fire
card.text: Defender {R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Wall of Water
card.text: Defender {U}: Wall of Water gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Wanderlust
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Wanderlust deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Warp Artifact
card.text: Enchant artifact At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller, Warp Artifact deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Weakness
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-1.

card.name: Web
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and has reach.

card.name: Wheel of Fortune
card.text: Each player discards his or her hand and draws seven cards.

card.name: White Knight
card.text: First strike Protection from black

card.name: White Ward
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from white. This effect doesn't remove White Ward.

card.name: Wild Growth
card.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool.

card.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
card.text: Flying {B}: Regenerate Will-o'-the-Wisp.

card.name: Winter Orb
card.text: Players can't untap more than one land during their untap steps.

card.name: Wooden Sphere
card.text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Word of Command
card.text: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card from it. You control that player until Word of Command finishes resolving. The player plays that card if able. While doing so, the player can activate mana abilities only if they're from lands he or she controls and only if mana they produce is spent to activate other mana abilities of lands he or she controls and/or play that card. If the chosen card is cast as a spell, you control the player while that spell is resolving.

card.name: Wrath of God
card.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Zombie Master
card.text: Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk. Other Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."
